articles.title: Veteran Bollywood lyricist Anwar Sagar dies in Mumbai - India Today
articles.description: Popular Bollywood lyricist Anwar Sagar breathed his last in a hospital in Mumbai today. The cause of his death is not known yet. He was in his 70s.
articles.content:
Veteran lyricist Anwar Sagar, best remembered for his hit track Wada Raha Sanam from Akshay Kumar-starrer Khiladi, passed away on Wednesday.
Anwar was brought dead to Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani hosp… [+1740 chars]
